data.eml:eml: New species and records of Zavreliella Kieffer, 1920 from Neotropical region (Diptera: Chironomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fusari, Lívia Maria, Pinho, Luiz Carlos, Lamas, Carlos José Einicker (2017): New species and records of Zavreliella Kieffer, 1920 from Neotropical region (Diptera: Chironomidae). Zootaxa 4221 (4): 486-490, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4221.4.5
